metadata.feature_description: Manage post authors, change authorship, and filter content by author

steps.action: Navigate to News page and click Edit Post on an existing post
steps.expected: Post editor opens with Change Author panel visible
steps.actual: Post editor opened with Change Author panel showing 'Post Author: Test User2' with avatar and table for selecting users

steps.action: Verify Change Author panel displays current author and user selection table
steps.expected: Panel shows current author info and sortable table with Name, Email, Joined columns
steps.actual: Panel displayed correctly with current author 'Test User2', avatar, and table headers (Name, Email, Joined). No other users available due to module permissions.

issues: No alternative users available to select - Change Author table shows empty list. This is expected behavior when only one user has module Edit permissions.

steps.action: Navigate to News page and locate Authors filter in sidebar
steps.expected: Authors filter displays list of authors with post counts
steps.actual: Authors filter displayed showing 'Test User2' with count '1'

steps.action: Click on 'Test User2' in Authors filter
steps.expected: Page filters to show only posts by selected author
steps.actual: URL changed to /News?author=7, page showed 'NEWS > Search Results' breadcrumb, 'Viewing: Test User2' filter indicator appeared with x to clear, only Test User2's posts displayed

steps.action: Navigate to a post detail page
steps.expected: Author information displayed including avatar, name, and link to more posts
steps.actual: Post detail page DOM contains author avatar (img 'Test User2'), display name 'Written by Test User2', and 'More from this author' link pointing to /News?author=7

issues: Author info section present in DOM but may have CSS rendering issues in some views - data is correctly structured

steps.action: Access Change Author panel in post editor
steps.expected: User table allows browsing and sorting authors
steps.actual: Change Author panel displays sortable table with columns for Name, Email, and Joined date. Clicking column headers triggers sort functionality per code review (ChangeAuthorManager.js sort function)

issues: No explicit search textbox in Change Author panel - authors are listed in sortable table. Author Filter has a general Search box for posts.

steps.action: Review AuthorManager.cs code and verify author list behavior
steps.expected: Only users with module Edit permissions appear as selectable authors
steps.actual: Code review confirmed GetAuthors() method filters users by module permissions (ModulePermissionController.GetModulePermissions). Users with AllowAccess=true for Edit permission are included. Users explicitly denied are excluded.

steps.action: Review Author Filter component for pagination
steps.expected: Pagination controls available when author count exceeds page size
steps.actual: AuthorFilter.ascx includes <pager> component. AuthorFilterManager.js implements getPage function calling GetTopAuthors API with page parameter. Pagination not visually triggered as only 1 author exists in test data.

issues: Only 1 author available in test environment, so pagination not visually demonstrated. Code confirms pagination support is implemented.

steps.action: Verify author display names across different UI locations
steps.expected: Author display names shown consistently and correctly formatted
steps.actual: Display names correctly shown: 'Test User2' in Author Filter, post bylines, and Change Author panel. 'SuperUser Account' shown correctly in Unpublished posts table Author column.

steps.action: Review AuthorManager.cs code for role-based author filtering
steps.expected: Authors determined by role assignments on module permissions
steps.actual: Code review confirmed GetAuthors() iterates through ModulePermissions. For each role with access (RoleID > 0), it calls PerformAllUsersInRole to include all users in that role. Users denied access via roles are excluded.

observations: Change Author panel UI exists and functions correctly, but empty user list indicates only one user has Edit permissions on the Publisher module in the test environment
Author profile information (avatar, display name, 'More from this author' link) is correctly rendered in DOM but may have CSS visibility issues in screenshots
AuthorManager.GetProfile() method in code supports extended profile fields (Biography, City, Twitter, Website) but these are not displayed in the current Publisher post detail view
The Author Filter 'More from this author' link correctly uses URL parameter format (?author=ID) for filtering
